title: Provided further that, the SRS converted and complited according to 2022 regulations, where 15% balcony is calculated in FSI, shall be eligible for the revised calculations as above
clause_text: Provided further that, the SRS converted and complited according to 2022 regulations, where 15% balcony is calculated in FSI, shall be eligible for the revised calculations as above. (3)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
